question: The average true course of the great circle is 100°. The true course of the rhumb line at point A is:
explanation:
If the average great circle course is 100°, then the rhumb line course (which stays constant) is approximately the same.

✅ Answer:

True course of the rhumb line at Point A ≈ 100°
